p: The number of eggs recorded for most cycles was lower throughout T2, especially when compared with the densities recorded between May and August in T1, whose peak was detected in July (44.170 eggs) ( Table I, Fig. 1). The pluviometric indexes of T1 and T2 presented a similar monthly distribution pattern with peaks between May and August and total amount of rainfall (T1 = 2316 mm³, T2 = 2450 mm³). When the data is analysed throughout the year, a relationship between the rainfall pattern and monthly density of eggs can be observed in T1 ( Fig. 1) while in T2, there is no association between these parameters ( Fig. 1).
